text.予定を完璧に守る理由…あの時、\r\n大切なことに気づかせてくれて\r\nありが:
Thank you for reminding me of 
what was so important at that 
moment… the reason why I kept 
my schedule perfectly.
text.これからも、私が間違えていたら\r\n教えてください。貴方は、私には\r\nない: Please continue to tell me if I am \nwrong. You have a perspective that I \ndo not have.
text.…このプランならトレーナーさんも\r\n私もしっかり楽しめるはず。\r\n次は…:
…I'm sure the trainer and I 
will have a good time with this 
plan. Next time… I'll have to 
ask her out properly.
text.ドイツでは、お正月はあまり大きく\r\n扱われません。日本の様々な\r\n伝統あ: In Germany, New Year's is not a big \ndeal. The various traditional rituals \nin Japan are interesting.
text.ケーキ屋の娘の誇りにかけて…\r\n今日のSchokoladeは\r\nいつも以: With all the pride of a cake baker's \ndaughter, today's Schokolade must be \nfinished with more care than usual.
text.完璧な調理…そして親愛の気持ちを\r\n込めました。特製ザッハトルテ、\r\n受: Perfectly prepared… and very dearly \nloved. Please accept our special \nSachertorte.
text.七夕のことはファルコンさんに\r\n教わりました。私の願いは…目標へ\r\n一直:
I learned about Tanabata from 
Ms. Falcon. My wish is… that 
I may advance in a straight 
line toward my goal.
text.せっかくのハロウィンですが、私が\r\n悪戯されることはないでしょう。\r\nお: It's Halloween, but I won't be \ntrick-or-treating. I've prepared all \nthe candy I can.
text.クリスマスは昔から好きなんです。\r\n父のケーキを買って帰るお客さんは\r\n:
I have always loved Christmas. I 
remember the happy smiles on the 
faces of all the customers who bought 
my father's cakes to take home.
text.貴方さえよければ、今日お時間を\r\nいただきたいのですが。…今日は、\r\n大: If you don't mind, I'd like to take \nsome time today. …because today is \nthe day I spend with my loved ones.
text.故郷では年末をパーティーで盛大に\r\n祝い新年を迎えるんです。Guten\r\: In my hometown, we celebrate the end \nof the year with a big party to \nwelcome the New Year.
text.お誕生日おめでとうございます。\r\nケーキの美味しいカフェがあります\r\nの: Happy Birthday! There is a cafe that \nserves delicious cakes, if you would \nlike to join us later.
text.両親から特製レシピを聞いて\r\nおきました。誕生日ケーキ、\r\n楽しみにして: I asked my parents for their special \nrecipe. Please look forward to the \nbirthday cake.
text.自分の生まれた日…己を見つめ\r\n人生のスケジュールを\r\n再確認できる大事: The day you were born… an important \nday to look at yourself and reconfirm \nthe schedule of your life.
text.誕生日はいつにも増して両親の顔を\r\n思い出します…2人の誇れる娘で\r\nあ:
On my birthday, I remember my 
parents' faces more than ever… I want 
to continue to be a daughter they can 
be proud of.
text.貴方にお知らせが来ています。\r\n今後の予定のためにも、\r\n忘れないうちに: You have been notified. Check \nit before you forget for \nyour future plans.
text.貴方にGeschenk…プレゼントが\r\n来ています。中身はなんでしょう？: Geschenk… a present for \nyou. What's inside?
text.予定通りのミッション消化…\r\nさすがですね。努力と達成の証、\r\nしっかり:
You completed your mission on 
schedule… as expected. I'm sure 
you'll receive the proof of your 
efforts and accomplishments.
text.もうすぐイベントが開催されます。\r\nしっかり楽しむためにも、\r\n予定を立: The event will be held soon. Please \nplan accordingly so that you can \nenjoy them to the fullest.
text.イベントが開催中です。\r\nイベント、いわばカーニバル…\r\n体が疼いてきま: The event is underway. Events, a \ncarnival, so to speak… It makes my \nbody tingle.
text.…少し、体が重いですね。\r\nスケジュールを調整すべき\r\nでしょうか…。: I feel a little heavy. Should I \nadjust my schedule?
text.休息の時間を作る必要が\r\nありそうです…。: I will need to make time for rest…
text.絶好調というのでしょうか…ふふ。\r\n貴方の指導のおかげで、\r\nスケジュー: I guess you could say I'm on a roll… \nheh. Thanks to your guidance, we'll \nbe on schedule.
text.素晴らしいコンディションです。\r\nあとは計画通り進んでいくだけ…！: Excellent condition. Now we just need \nto keep going as planned…!
text.いい調子…期待していた通りの\r\n成果が得られそうです。: Good shape… looks like it's going to \ndeliver exactly what I was hoping for.
text.さて、プラン通りに始めましょう。\r\n充実したトレーニングになりそう\r\nで: Now, let's start following \nthe plan. It's going to be \na great training session.
text.調子は良好です。\r\n予定通りのメニューを\r\n消化していけるかと。: I am in good shape. I think I will be \nable to digest the menu as planned.
text.今のペースなら、\r\n現行のスケジュールで\r\n問題はなさそうですね。: At the current pace, the current \nschedule seems fine.
text.なぜでしょう…少し気怠く…。\r\n調整が必要かもしれません…。: I don't know why… a bit lazy… Maybe I \nneed to adjust…
text.トレーニングの予定なのに…\r\n体が少し重いんです。: I'm supposed to be training… but my \nbody is a little heavy.
text.うぅん…どうも、尻尾の毛並みまで\r\n乱れているような気がします…。: Hmmm… I think even the fur on her \ntail seems to be disheveled…
text.モチベーションのコントロールが\r\nうまくいきません…。: I am having trouble controlling \nmy motivation…
text.…今日もレースというのは、\r\nスケジュールに無理があるかと…。: …I think it's too much to \nask for a race today…
text.レース続きになると、\r\n今後のプランにも影響が…。: The race to the finish line will \naffect our future plans…
text.Sturm und Drang…！\r\n正直、ウズウズしています…！: Sturm und Drang…! To be honest, I'm \nitching to…!
text.計画に寸分の狂いもなく…まさに\r\n理想的なコンディションです。\r\n勝利に: We are in perfect condition… no \ndeviations from the plan. We have no \nworries about winning.
text.時間をかけ、貴方と予定を\r\n作ってきた甲斐がありました。\r\n…目的を果た: It was worth the time and effort \nto make plans with you. …I will \nfulfill my purpose.
text.体調よし、メンタルよし、\r\n尻尾のカットよし…。\r\nまさしく、準備万全で: Physical condition is good, mental \ncondition is good, tail cut is good… \nWe are just about ready to go.
text.予定通り、良い状態で臨めますね。\r\nあとは結果を出すだけです。: We are on schedule and in good shape. \nNow we just need to get results.
text.おかげで調整もうまくいきました。\r\n私も貴方に恥じない走りを。: Thanks to you, the adjustment went \nwell. I will not be ashamed to run as \nwell as you.
text.…心配はいりません。\r\nやってきたことに間違いは\r\nなかったと証明してき: Don't worry. We will prove that we \nhave done everything right.
text.toi,toi,toi…よし。\r\nそれでは、行きましょうか。: TOI, TOI, TOI… okay. Let's go, then.
text.おおむねスケジュール通りですね。\r\n目標達成は十分狙えます。: We are generally on schedule. We are \nwell on target to achieve our goals.
text.ベストの状態ではありませんが…\r\n目標は見失っていません。: We are not at our best… but we have \nnot lost sight of our goal.
text.少々予定は狂いましたが、\r\nまだ挽回は…可能です。: We're a little off schedule, but we \ncan still make up for it.
text.不調は否めませんね…。\r\nとにかく今の全力を出してきます。: I can't deny that I'm in a slump… \nAnyway, I will give it my all now.
text.想定外の事態になりました…\r\nですが、落ち込む前にまずは\r\nしっかり走ら: This is an unexpected situation… \nBut before I get depressed, I \nhave to run well first…
text.今は両親に恥じないよう\r\n最後まで走り切る…それだけです。: Now, I will run to the end so \nthat I don't disgrace my parents… \nthat's all I can do.
text.どうも集中できません…\r\nしかし走れないわけでは。: I can't concentrate… but that doesn't \nmean I can't run.
text.これまでのこと、感謝します。: Thank you for all you \nhave done so far.
text.誇れるレースでした。: It was a race to be proud of.
text.及第点…次はさらに上へ。: A passing grade… next \ntime, go even higher.
text.スケジュールをもっと整理しないと…。: I need to organize my schedule better…
text.計画を…1から見直さなければなりませんね…。: We need to rethink our plans… from \nthe ground up…
text.応援してくれた皆さんに\r\n感謝をお返ししてきます。: I'm going to return the gratitude to \nall of you who have supported me.
text.少し緊張しています。\r\ntoi,toi,toi…。: I am a little nervous. TOI,TOI,TOI…
text.私のトレーナーになるのは予め\r\n決まっていた…と仰いましたね。\r\nそうか: You said you had already decided that \nyou would be my trainer. Maybe… \nmaybe. Hmmm.
text.Guten Morgen.\r\n朝はどうしても慌ただしくなりがち\r\nですね: Mornings tend to be hectic. \nPreparation the day before \nis essential.
text.日本の朝食といえば…\r\n納豆ですよね。\r\n私、大好きなんです。: Speaking of Japanese breakfast… \nNatto, right? I love it.
text.食事は25分30秒で済ませ、復習を\r\n…と、いけない。ファルコンさんと\r\:
I finished my meal in 25 minutes 
and 30 seconds, and reviewed… 
oh no. I was supposed to meet 
Ms. Falcon for lunch.
text.…毎日、8秒。カフェテリアに\r\n新作のデザートが並んでいないかの\r\nチェ: …every day for eight seconds. That's \nthe time I use to check the cafeteria \nfor new desserts.
text.予定の再確認に4分、家族と友人を\r\n想うのに5分…ベッドに入り\r\n眠るま:
Four minutes to reconfirm plans, 
five minutes to think of family 
and friends… we make the most of 
the time we have before we go to 
bed and fall asleep.
text.今日も終わってしまいますね…。\r\n1日の反省と明日の予定作り、\r\n未来に: Today is ending… Let's reflect on the \nday, make plans for tomorrow, and \nprepare for the future.
text.昔から、春の花々には敬意を\r\n払っています。厳しい冬を耐え、\r\n毎年きち:
I have always admired spring flowers. 
The way they endure the harsh winters 
and bloom properly every year… it's 
magnificent.
text.熱中症のリスクは常に存在します。\r\n水分補給のスケジュール表を作り、\r\n: The risk of heat stroke is always \npresent. Create a hydration schedule \nand carry your own water bottle.
text.ドイツの秋といえば…やはり\r\nオクトーバーフェストですね。\r\nぜひ1度、: Autumn in Germany is the time for \nOktoberfest. I would like to invite \nyou to Oktoberfest.
text.冬はどうしても屋内にいる時間が\r\n長くなりますね。…新作ケーキの\r\nレシ: In winter, we tend to spend more time \nindoors. Let's start developing \nrecipes for new cakes, shall we?
text.メトロノームに合わせ鼻歌を歌って\r\nいたら、背後にファルコンさんが…\r\n: I was humming along to the metronome \nwhen Ms. Falcon came up behind me… I \nwas so surprised that I just screamed…
text.あれだけの交友関係を無理なく\r\n維持できるとは…ジョーダンさんは\r\nスケ: I think Ms. Jordan may be a master at \nmanaging her schedule to keep up with \nthat many friendships without strain.
text.ナカヤマさんの勝負への姿勢は\r\n私とは対極的ですが、だからこそ\r\n学ぶも:
Your attitude toward competition 
is the opposite of mine, but 
I think that's why I have something 
to learn from you.
text.ゴルシさんとケーキ店を巡ったの\r\nですが…いつの間にか駄菓子\r\n掴み取り: Golsi and I toured a cake store, but \nbefore we knew it, it had turned into \na candy-collecting tour.
text.映画は好きですが、ゾンビだけは…\r\n腐敗した遺体があんなに動ける\r\nはず: I like movies, but only zombies… It's \nstrange that decomposing corpses \ncan't move like that…!
text.ステップ1つに至るまで完璧に…\r\n観客の皆さんにも一緒に走った相手\r\nに:
I want to make sure that every single 
step is perfect… I want to show 
respect to the audience and to the 
people I ran with.
text.元々カーニバルは大好きですから。\r\nこの衣装を着て踊れると思うと、\r\n心: I have always loved carnivals. The \nthought of dancing in this costume \nmakes my heart sing. Hmmm.
text.ふわふわしていながら、\r\n激しい動きにも耐えられる\r\n丈夫な造り…素晴ら: Fluffy, yet sturdy enough \nto withstand strenuous activity… \na great outfit.
text.完璧にフィットするサイズ…\r\nこれを作ってくださった\r\nマイスターの腕に: Perfectly sized to fit… I admire \nthe skill of the master craftsman \nwho made it.
text.開店前のお店に漂う\r\n作りたてのお菓子の匂い…\r\n時々、実家が懐かしくな:
The smell of freshly made sweets 
wafting through the store before it 
opens sometimes makes me nostalgic 
for my parents' house.
text.ドイツでは昼食がメインなんです。\r\n今でもその習慣は変えていません。\r\n:
In Germany, lunch is the main 
thing. Even now, I haven't changed 
that habit. It is also reasonable 
for exercise.
text.秒単位でセットできる目覚ましが\r\nあるとよいのですが…結局、\r\n体内時計:
It would be nice to have an alarm 
that can be set to wake me up in 
seconds… but in the end, my body 
clock may be the best.
text.テントウムシに会える\r\n季節になりました。\r\n…かわいいですよね…。: It's the season to see ladybugs. They \nare so cute…
text.さすがに暑いですね…。\r\n湖に行きたいところですが、\r\nここはプールで涼: It is indeed very hot… I would like \nto go to the lake, but let's cool off \nat the pool.
text.スポーツの秋、ですか。それなら\r\n私は…サッカーがしたいですね。\r\nよけ:
Autumn is the season for sports, 
isn't it? Then I would like to play 
soccer. If you don't mind, I'd like 
to play with you.
text.雪が降ると、シュトレンを思い出し\r\nますね…。クリスマスの時期は、\r\n毎: Snow reminds me of Stollen… I used to \nhelp make them every Christmas.
text.共に、目標への道を\r\n歩んでいきましょう。\r\nまずは計画、ですね。: Let's work together to reach our \ngoals. First, a plan.
text.スケジュール確認、よし。\r\n今日も始めていきましょう。: Schedule confirmed, okay. Let's get \nstarted today.
text.目指す場所は遠くとも、\r\n着実に予定を立て、\r\n辿り着いてみせます。: We may be far away, but we have a \nsteady schedule and we will get there.
text.もちろん準備は済んでいます。\r\nご指導のほど、お願いします。: Of course we are already prepared. \nThank you for your guidance.
text.新鮮ですね…。ドイツでは\r\n海水浴より湖水浴の方が\r\nメジャーなんです。: It's fresh… In Germany, lake bathing \nis more popular than sea bathing.
text.貴方となら、目標に辿り着けると…\r\n心から信じています。: I truly believe that with you, we \nwill reach our goal.
text.一緒に計画を詰めて行きましょう。\r\n貴方を、頼りにしています。: Let's work together to finalize a \nplan. We are counting on you.
text.もし私の不器用さが\r\nまた出ていると思ったら、\r\n遠慮なく教えてください: If you think I'm being clumsy again, \nfeel free to let me know.
text.今は自分を、心から誇れます…。: Now I can be truly proud of myself…
text.私だけでは、きっとここまで\r\n来られませんでした。: I am sure I could not have made it \nthis far on my own.
text.着実に1歩ずつ…目標へ。: Steadily one step at \na time… to the goal.
text.目指すべき自分へ、歩を進めます。: We will walk forward to the person we \nshould aim to be.
text.エイシンフラッシュです。\r\n共に誇りある勝利へ。: This is Eishin Flash. Together, to a \nproud victory.
text.完璧なスケジュールこそが、\r\n勝利への道です。: A perfect schedule is \nthe path to victory.
text.詰めが甘かったですね。: I didn't pack it in well.
text.今こそ成就の時！: Now is the time for fulfillment!
text.勝利への歩みに、1歩たりとも狂いなし…\r\n今こそ成就の時！: Not a single step to victory… Now is \nthe time for fulfillment!
text.貴方と立てたスケジュールに…\r\n狂いはありませんでした。: The schedule that we set up with you… \nit was flawless.
text.明日はこちらがもらえる予定です。: We will be getting this one tomorrow.
text.さて、\r\n今回のトレーニング予定は…。: Now, let's see, what is the training \nschedule this time…
text.学園の歴史と伝統…\r\nぜひ学んでおきましょう。: The history and traditions \nof the school… we encourage \nyou to learn about them.
text.目標に向け、\r\n確実に経験を積んでいきたいです。: I would like to gain experience to \nachieve my goal.
text.ウマ娘名鑑のレベルが上がった\r\nようです。ご確認を。: It seems that the level of the \nhorsegirl directory has been raised. \nPlease check it out.
text.スケジュールは厳守、ですよ。: The schedule is strictly \nadhered to, you know.
text.お力添えいたします。: We will be happy to assist you.
text.この力と共に、さらに先へ。: With this power, we go further.
text.慌てる必要はありません。: There is no need to panic.
text.期待通りの成果かと。: I thought the results \nwere as expected.
text.学園の伝統をまとっている自覚を\r\n持っていきたいですね。: I would like to be aware that I am \nwearing the traditions of the school.
text.学業とレースの両立…\r\n学生ならば当然のことです。: Balancing schoolwork and racing… a \nnatural thing for students to do.
text.ステージの上での姿、\r\n両親にも見せたいです。: I want my parents to see me on stage.
text.誇りと勇気が湧いてくるようです。: It seems to inspire pride and courage.
text.もちろんサイズは完璧。\r\n寸分の狂いもありません。: Of course the size is perfect. Not an \ninch out of place.
text.貴方が積み上げてきたもの…\r\n見せていただきましょう。: Let's see what you've built up.
text.互いの誇りをかけ…\r\n正々堂々、勝負です。: We will put our pride on the line… \nand play fair and square.
text.おはようございます。1日を\r\n始めるおまじないを、ご一緒に。\r\n…Ich: Good morning, and I hope you'll join \nme for a spell to start your day.… \nIch gebe mein Bestes!
text.皆と挨拶を交わすたびに\r\n美味しそうな匂いがすると…\r\n原因は朝に焼いた:
Every time you say hello to everyone, 
you say you smell something 
delicious… and the cause is the 
cookies you baked in the morning.
text.糖分摂取は、午後を頑張るためにも\r\n有効です。ただし、くれぐれも\r\n計画: Sugar intake is also a good way to \nget through the afternoon. But be \nsure to plan ahead.
text.忙しくても、必ず休憩はとる。\r\nよい仕事をこなす秘訣だと、\r\n父は言って:
Even if you are busy, always 
take a break. My father used 
to say that this was the secret 
of doing a good job.
text.この時間にお菓子は禁物です。\r\nもし食べたくても、\r\n明日まで我慢…です: Sweets are not allowed at this time. \nEven if you want to eat them, you \nhave to wait until tomorrow.
text.生地の仕込みは完了。\r\nあとは冷蔵庫で12時間寝かせて…\r\nふふ、楽しみ: The dough is ready. Now it's time to \nput it in the fridge for 12 hours… \nHmmm… look forward to it.
text.桜を見ていると、両親との花見を\r\n思い出しますね…ふふ、実は\r\nドイツに:
Cherry blossoms remind me of cherry 
blossom viewing with my parents… 
Actually, there are rows of cherry 
trees in Germany as well.
text.今年も暑くなりましたね…\r\nしかしご安心を。冷たいケーキ、\r\nKalte: It's been hot again this year… but \ndon't worry. I made a cold cake, \nKalter Hund.
text.最近は、なるべく低カロリーの\r\nお菓子を模索しています。食欲の秋\r\nとい:
Recently, I have been searching 
for snacks that are as low in calories 
as possible. Even though it is autumn, 
I have to keep a tight control on 
my appetite.
text.基本的にお菓子は熱を冷ましたもの\r\nが多いですが、食べれば心は\r\n温まる:
Basically, most sweets are made to 
cool down the heat, but if you eat 
them, your heart will be warmed… it's 
a strange thing, isn't it?
text.ファルコンさん、私の服の匂いで\r\n作ったお菓子を言い当てるんです。\r\nな: Ms. Falcon, she can tell what candy I \nmade by the smell of my clothes. It's \nkind of embarrassing…
text.新作を作るとバクシンオーさんが\r\n必ず現れて試食してくださいます。\r\n助:
Whenever I make a new product, 
Bakushin O always shows up and tastes 
it. It's very helpful… but where in 
the world did she come from…?
text.最近、手作りのケーキを\r\nフラワーさんと交換しています。\r\n優しい味で…: Lately I've been swapping homemade \ncakes with Ms. Flower. It tastes so \ntender… and so comforting.
text.成してきた全てを問われる点では、\r\nレースもパティシエの仕事も\r\n同じ…:
I believe that both racing and 
patissier work are equally 
challenging in terms of everything 
you have achieved.
text.誕生日など、特別な日を彩るのも\r\nパティシエの仕事。ならば私は…\r\n走り:
It is the pastry chef's job to color 
special occasions such as birthdays. 
Then I will… I will color the race 
with my running.
text.職人とは本来、厳しい修行を経て\r\n与えられる称号。この衣装の持つ\r\n重み:
A craftsman is essentially a title 
given after rigorous training. I 
would like to keep in mind the 
importance of this costume.
text.この衣装を着ていると、\r\n作品に向かう意欲が湧いて…\r\nなんだかレース前: When I wear this outfit, I feel \nmotivated to work on the piece… it's \nkind of like before a race.
text.朝は、その日全ての準備を\r\n完了させる時間…\r\nパティシエの鉄則です。: The morning is the time to complete \nall the day's preparations… an \nironclad rule for pastry chefs.
text.食後のデザートか、間食か…\r\n同じお菓子でも、タイミングで\r\n内容をアレ:
Whether it's an after-dinner dessert 
or a snack… even if it's the same 
snack, we need to rearrange the 
timing and the content.
text.Konditor…パティシエの1日は\r\n夜に始まっているともいえます。\r\: Konditor… It could be said that a \npastry chef's day begins at night. We \nhave to prepare for tomorrow's event.
text.お花見の季節…雪ではなく、\r\n桜をイメージしたシュトレンを\r\n作ってみる:
In the season of cherry blossom 
viewing, it would be nice to make a 
stollen with the image of cherry 
blossoms instead of snow.
text.ドイツを旅するなら夏が最適です。\r\n機会があれば、案内いたしますよ。\r\n:
Summer is the best time to travel in 
Germany. If we have the opportunity, 
we will show you around. Let us help 
you make your schedule.
text.栗拾いに出かけたいですね…。\r\n美味しそうなモンブランのレシピを\r\n思い:
I would love to go out to pick 
chestnuts… I just came up with 
a recipe for a delicious looking 
Mont Blanc.
text.バレンタインにクリスマス…\r\nお菓子の出番が近づくと\r\n気が引き締まりま: Valentine's Day, Christmas… When the \ntime comes for sweets to be served, \nwe are all in a state of excitement.
text.準備は完璧。では、Öffnen…\r\n開店といきましょうか。: Everything is ready. So, Öffnen… \nlet's open the store.
text.レースにおいてもマイスターの\r\n境地へ…きっと達してみせます。: In racing, too, I will reach the \nlevel of a master… I promise.
text.勝利という作品を完成させるまで、\r\n1つ1つの工程を、精確に。: We will be precise in every step of \nthe process, until we have completed \nour work of triumph.
text.美味しさと栄養の両立…\r\nプロテインクッキーには\r\nかなりの可能性を感じ: I see quite a bit of potential \nin protein cookies… both in \ntaste and nutrition.
text.今はただ全力を尽くすことに\r\n集中し…終わったら、共に\r\n甘味を楽しみま: For now, let's just focus on doing \nthe best we can… and when we're done, \nwe'll enjoy the sweet treats together.
text.勝利の味をトレーナーさんにも\r\n味わっていただくため、\r\n下ごしらえは欠: Preparation is essential so \nthat the trainers can enjoy \nthe taste of victory.
text.力を合わせ、最高の結果を\r\n生み出したいものですね――\r\n両親が厨房でそ: We want to work together to produce \nthe best results - just as my parents \ndid in the kitchen.
text.私も立派なマイスターになれたでしょうか。: I hope I have become a worthy Meister.
text.職人としての新境地、\r\n見えた気がします。: I think I have found a new frontier \nas a craftsman.
text.エイシンフラッシュです。\r\n突き詰めた最高の味をお届けします。: Eishin Flash. We bring you \nthe best taste of the best \nthat we have to offer.
text.厨房に立つ両親の姿を思い出しますね…。: It reminds me of my parents standing \nin the kitchen…
text.幼い頃に憧れた衣装…\r\nどこか、夢を見ているようです。: The costumes I adored as a child… \nSomewhere, I seem to be dreaming.
text.真心と細心。軽妙にして玄妙。\r\n未体験の味を…ご堪能ください。:
Sincerity and attention to detail. 
Light and subtle. Please enjoy 
the taste that you have never 
experienced before.
text.積み上げた味を、召し上がれ。: The taste that we have built up, \nplease enjoy.
text.レシピ、計量、調理…全て完璧。\r\n積み上げた味を、召し上がれ。: Recipes, measurements, cooking… all \nperfect. The taste that we have built \nup, please enjoy.
text.勝利のレシピ通り…\r\n美味しく仕上がりましたね。: As per your winning recipe… it turned \nout delicious.
text.完璧なレシピを完璧な手順で。\r\n日頃の感謝の証です。\r\n必ずや優勝してみ:
Perfect recipe with perfect 
instructions. It's a testament 
to our daily appreciation. We 
will make sure you win.
text.時間は限られています。\r\n心をくすぐる適切なモチーフを、\r\n迅速に見つけ: Time is limited. We must quickly find \nthe right motifs to tickle our fancy.
text.この学園の真髄を感じ…\r\nWunderbar――\r\n素晴らしいの一言です: I felt the essence of this academy… \nWunderbar― one word: excellent.
text.結果は残念でしたが、両親には、\r\n貴重な経験ができたと報告\r\nしたいです:
Although the result was disappointing, 
I would like to report to my 
parents that it was a valuable 
experience… "Next time for sure", 
right?
text.イベントミッションはこちら\r\nです。多岐にわたるため、緻密な\r\nプランニ: The event mission is here. Due to the \nvariety of missions, detailed \nplanning is recommended.
text.こちら、報酬です。\r\nお忘れなく。: Here is your reward. Don't forget.
